replies.body:
*Custom Skins* fall under a [**use at your own risk**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848-Third-Party-Applications) category. Since we don't develop third-party skins or any programs associated with applying them, it's tough for us to give them an "all clear". 

If you have any other questions, let me know.
Is it still possible to use Wooxy to still get custom skins? ofc just for aesthetics
